price: نو بيا هغوى پر خپلو ځانو ورتاو شول، سره ويې ويل: يقيناً همدا تاسو ظالمان ياست.
arabic: فَرَجَعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ أَنتُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: farajaʿū ilā anfusihim faqālū innakum antumu al-ẓālimūna
